column4: I installed tightvncserver the other day and I am  wonder  what windows manager it invokes ? When I vnc into this computer  It shows something like tom's windows manger .  I am running 7.10
you have to type gnome-session or startkde to start your DE
it'll just be a terminal when u first connect.
it's only running a terminal i believe.  it's not a window manager of any sort
